prompt: Build a minimalist contact us page with a clean white background and subtle grey accents. Feature a simple 'Contact' header in dark grey (Color(0xFF424242)) using clean typography. Display contact information in a streamlined list format without cards - just icons and text aligned horizontally. Use minimal grey icons (Color(0xFF757575)) for Phone (+1 555 123 4567), Email (info@minimal.com), and Location (789 Minimal St, Clean City, CC 11111). Create a compact contact form with borderless text fields that have only bottom borders in light grey. Include fields for Name, Email, and Message only, keeping the design uncluttered. Add a simple text button labeled 'Send' in dark grey without background color or elevation. Maintain generous white space with 32-pixel spacing between major sections and 16-pixel spacing between form elements. The overall design should emphasize simplicity, readability, and clean lines with no shadows or decorative elements.
